remarks: Two different intersecting lines (expressed in terms of atoms) meet at their common point (atom).  (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2012.)
statement:
2llnm.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
2llnm.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2llnm.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2llnm.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2llnma1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ -. R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) -> ( ( Q .\/ P ) ./\ ( Q .\/ R ) ) = Q ) $.
